Sentencas: Direct internal reforming in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) results in increased overall efficiency of the system.
Titulo: CFD analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell with internal reforming: Coupled interactions of transport, heterogeneous catalysis and electrochemical processes

Sentencas: Present study focus on the chemical and electrochemical process in an internally reforming anode supported SOFC button cell running on humidified CH4 (3% H2O).
Titulo: CFD analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell with internal reforming: Coupled interactions of transport, heterogeneous catalysis and electrochemical processes

Sentencas: The computational approach employs a detailed multi-step model for heterogeneous chemistry in the anode, modified Butler-Volmer formalism for the electrochemistry and Dusty Gas Model (DGM) for the porous media transport.
Titulo: CFD analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell with internal reforming: Coupled interactions of transport, heterogeneous catalysis and electrochemical processes

Sentencas: Two-dimensional elliptic model equations are solved for a button cell configuration.
Titulo: CFD analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell with internal reforming: Coupled interactions of transport, heterogeneous catalysis and electrochemical processes

Sentencas: The electrochemical model assumes hydrogen as the only electrochemically active species.
Titulo: CFD analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell with internal reforming: Coupled interactions of transport, heterogeneous catalysis and electrochemical processes

Sentencas: The predicted cell performances are compared with experimental reports.
Titulo: CFD analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell with internal reforming: Coupled interactions of transport, heterogeneous catalysis and electrochemical processes

Sentencas: The results show that model predictions are in good agreement with experimental observation except the open circuit potentials.
Titulo: CFD analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell with internal reforming: Coupled interactions of transport, heterogeneous catalysis and electrochemical processes

Sentencas: Furthermore, the steam content in the anode feed stream is found to have remarkable effect on the resulting overpotential losses and surface coverages of various species at the three-phase boundary.
Titulo: CFD analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell with internal reforming: Coupled interactions of transport, heterogeneous catalysis and electrochemical processes
